Articles.Content:
Here it is, another of my *glorious* forum games.

Basically, I\'ll start. You say if you want to go up or down the srairs and what you find there.

E.g.

Poster 1: Go up the stairs to the first floor.

There, you find fifty rainbow snakes.

Poster 2: Go down the stairs to ground level.

At ground level, you find <what ever>

Poster 3: Etc.

Basically, you put if you go up/down the stairs, what level you\'re on then, and what you find there.

Btw, you cannot leave the building.

Also no elevators.

And you may only go up/down 1 level at a time.

I\'ll start.

You go down the stairs to level -1 (The basement).

There, you find a box inside a box inside a box inside of a box that is on fire.

YOU GO DEEPER to level -2

You find Inception.

You go to level -3.

You find a portal to some other dimension.

You go to level -2.

You find a massive stick.

You go to level -4.

You find the secret Squad Experimental Testing Area.

EDIT: fix\'d

You go to level -999,999,999.

You find the secret Squad Experimental Testing Area.

No.

Only 1 level at a time.

Supposed to be level -3, Luigi . I\'ll start from there.

You go to level -2.

You find a life size Kerbal, escaped from the Squad Testing Area.

You go to level -1.

You find GOLD PRECIOUS AND EXPENSIVE GOLD

You go to ground level

You find an anti-alchemist who turns your gold into lead.

You go to level +1

You find doors. And a gerbil.

You got to level +2

You find nova in person.

You go up one level (level +3)

You find a window to look out of...it just looks back at you and smiles.

up one level (level 4)

You find 2 Tsar Bombas.
You go to level 4 and find a senior citizen rave party

up one level (5)

you find pants. tons of it.

You go up 1 level (level 6)

You find 42.

Up to 7. You find several 'my rocket idea v1.1' to build a HUGE ship, with 6 stages, also carrying a dozen of RGK (Random Generated kerbals). Unfortunately, no fuel to put in the fuel tanks, to launch the plush ship. Maybe in the next stage ?

Visit my signature for more info about 'my rocket idea v1.1' ;P
You go up to 8. You find more self-advertisement.

Somehow the escaped Kerbal got up here and you take him with you.

You go up to ten.
You go to level 11 and find a nuclear bomb. Luckily the walls of this room are obsidian!

Onward to level 12!

You find a witch who takes the kerbal and turns him into a newt.

Onward to 12.5!

You find the Kerbal suite and hit your head on the low ceiling.

Up to level 13.

You find all the pictures of patched up crashes..

Onward to level 14

You find HarvesteR working on fixing .14\'s bugs.

Is this skyscraper actually the offices of Squad?

On level 15, you find the docking practice center, where pilots go to train for docking that comes in .15. All over, images of the various failures (three burst space stations and a broken docking collar, to name a few) dot the walls to the point where the original wallpaper cannot be seen.
